  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.client.HalApiClient.create(HalResourceLoader, RequestMetricsCollector)
    use HalApiClientBuilder instead
    io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.client.HalApiClient.create(HalResourceLoader, RequestMetricsCollector, HalApiAnnotationSupport, HalApiReturnTypeSupport)
    use HalApiClientBuilder instead
    io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.common.RequestMetricsCollector.onMethodInvocationFinished(Class, String, long)
    use startStopwatch(Class, Supplier) instead
    io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.RhymeBuilder.withoutResourceLoader()
    no longer required because there is now a default HalResourceLoader implementation available, use RhymeBuilder.create() instead
    io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.server.AsyncHalResponseRenderer.create(RequestMetricsCollector, ExceptionStatusAndLoggingStrategy)
    Use HalResponseRendererBuilder instead
    io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.server.AsyncHalResponseRenderer.create(RequestMetricsCollector, ExceptionStatusAndLoggingStrategy, HalApiAnnotationSupport, HalApiReturnTypeSupport)
    Use HalResponseRendererBuilder instead
  • Deprecated Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.exceptions.HalApiClientException(HalResponse, String, Throwable)
    use HalApiClientException(HalResponse, Throwable) instead, and make sure that HalResponse.withUri(String) was called
